song_name: Dry Dry Ruins - Mario Kart Wii
metrics_conclusion: Dry Dry Ruins - Mario Kart Wii has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion:
Dry Dry Ruins - Mario Kart Wii is written in the key of C Mixolydian.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the 4th most popular key among Mixolydian keys and     the 29th most popular  among all keys. The C Mixolydian scale is similar to the C Major scale except that its 7th note (Bâ™­) is a half step lower.  Mixolydian chord progressions are heavily featured in many genres of music like classic rock, which relies on the major chord built on the 7th scale degree. 

See the C Mixolydian Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
